original_text: And in the midst of the seven candlesticks one like unto the Son of man, clothed with a garment down to the foot, and girt about the paps with a golden girdle.
korean_text: 촛대 사이에 인자 같은 이가 발에 끌리는 옷을 입고 가슴에 금띠를 띠고

sentences.original_text: And in the midst of the seven candlesticks
one like unto the Son of man
clothed with a garment down to the foot
and girt about the paps with a golden girdle
